items.name: case swapInterval
items.desc: Set or get the swap interval.

items.name: case surfaceOrder
items.desc: Set or get the surface order.

items.name: case surfaceOpacity
items.desc: Set or get the surface opacity.

items.name: case surfaceBackingSize
items.desc: Set or get the height and width of the back buffer.

items.name: case gpuVertexProcessing
items.desc: Get whether the CPU is currently processing vertices with the GPU.

items.name: case gpuFragmentProcessing
items.desc: Get whether the CPU is currently processing fragments with the GPU.

items.name: case hasDrawable
items.desc: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether a drawable is attached to the context.

items.name: case mpSwapsInFlight
items.desc: The number of frames that the multithreaded OpenGL engine can process before stalling.

items.name: case swapRectangle
items.desc: Sets or gets the swap rectangle.

items.name: case swapRectangleEnable
items.desc: Enables or disables the swap rectangle in the contextâ€™s drawable object.

items.name: case rasterizationEnable
items.desc: If disabled, all rasterization of 2D and 3D primitives is disabled.

items.name: case stateValidation
items.desc: If enabled, OpenGL inspects the context state each time the update method is called to ensure that it is in an appropriate state for switching between renderers.
